body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/value as observation_free_text
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a [openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.observation_archetype.v0]
  )
WHERE
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0004]/value/value matches {'Kostas-01', 'Kostas-02'}
